exceptions.tactic: rewrite (eqSym PA (Plus a Zero) a (eqRefl PA a)).
exceptions.exn: In environment a : Term The term "eqRefl PA a" has type "SysPrf PA (equal a a)" while it is expected to have type "SysPrf PA (equal (Plus a Zero) a)".

exceptions.tactic: apply (eqPlus PA a Zero a Zero (eqRefl PA a) (eqRefl PA Zero)).
exceptions.exn: In environment a : Term The term "eqRefl PA a" has type "SysPrf PA (equal a a)" while it is expected to have type "SysPrf PA (equal a Zero)".

original: intros a. rewrite (eqSym PA (Plus a Zero) a (eqRefl PA a)). apply (eqPlus PA a Zero a Zero (eqRefl PA a) (eqRefl PA Zero)).
